content: 1 Paul and Timothy, Servants of Jesus Christ,— Unto all the saints in Christ Jesus who are in Philippi, With overseers and ministers:—
content_old: 1 Paul and Timothy, Servants of Jesus Christ,— Unto all the saints in Christ Jesus who are in Philippi, With overseers and ministers:—

content: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace, From God our Father and Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace, From God our Father and Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 3 I am giving thanks unto my God､ on occasion of all my remembrance of you,
content_old: 3 I am giving thanks unto my God､ on occasion of all my remembrance of you,

content: 4 At all times､ in every supplication of mine､ in behalf of you all With joy my supplication making,—
content_old: 4 At all times､ in every supplication of mine､ in behalf of you all With joy my supplication making,—

content: 5 On account of your contribution unto the glad-message､ from the first day until the present:
content_old: 5 On account of your contribution unto the glad-message､ from the first day until the present:

content: 6 Being persuaded of this very thing— That he who hath begun in you a good work Will perfect it､ until the day of Jesus Christ;
content_old: 6 Being persuaded of this very thing— That he who hath begun in you a good work Will perfect it､ until the day of Jesus Christ;

content: 7 According as it is right in me to have this regard in behalf of you all,— Because ye have had me in your hearts, Both in my bonds and in the defence and confirmation of the glad-message All of you being joint partakers of my favour.
content_old: 7 According as it is right in me to have this regard in behalf of you all,— Because ye have had me in your hearts, Both in my bonds and in the defence and confirmation of the glad-message All of you being joint partakers of my favour.

content: 8 For God is my witness how I long for you all in the tender affections of Christ Jesus.
content_old: 8 For God is my witness how I long for you all in the tender affections of Christ Jesus.

content: 9 And this I pray— That your love may be yet more and more pre-eminent in personal knowledge and all perception,
content_old: 9 And this I pray— That your love may be yet more and more pre-eminent in personal knowledge and all perception,

content: 10 To the end ye may be putting to the test the things that differ, In order that ye may be incorrupt and may give no occasion of stumbling､ unto the day of Christ,
content_old: 10 To the end ye may be putting to the test the things that differ, In order that ye may be incorrupt and may give no occasion of stumbling､ unto the day of Christ,

content: 11 Filled with that fruit of righteousness which is through Jesus Christ unto the glory and praise of God.
content_old: 11 Filled with that fruit of righteousness which is through Jesus Christ unto the glory and praise of God.

content: 12 Howbeit､ I am minded､ brethren､ that ye should be getting to know That the things which relate unto myself rather､ unto an advancement of the glad-message have fallen out,
content_old: 12 Howbeit､ I am minded､ brethren､ that ye should be getting to know That the things which relate unto myself rather､ unto an advancement of the glad-message have fallen out,

content: 13 So that my bonds have become manifest in Christ､ in the whole palace, and unto all the rest,—
content_old: 13 So that my bonds have become manifest in Christ､ in the whole palace, and unto all the rest,—

content: 14 And so that the most of the brethren in the Lord assured by my bonds are becoming more abundantly bold to be fearlessly speaking the word of God:—
content_old: 14 And so that the most of the brethren in the Lord assured by my bonds are becoming more abundantly bold to be fearlessly speaking the word of God:—

content: 15 Some indeed､ by reason of envy and strife— Some however､ by reason of good will—are proclaiming the Christ:
content_old: 15 Some indeed､ by reason of envy and strife— Some however､ by reason of good will—are proclaiming the Christ:

content: 16 These indeed､ out of love, Knowing that for the defence of the glad-message I am set;
content_old: 16 These indeed､ out of love, Knowing that for the defence of the glad-message I am set;

content: 17 But those out of faction are declaring the Christ, Not purely—supposing to rouse up tribulation with my bonds.
content_old: 17 But those out of faction are declaring the Christ, Not purely—supposing to rouse up tribulation with my bonds.

content: 18 What then? That in any way Whether in pretext､ or in truth Christ is declared And in this I rejoice—Yea､ and will rejoice!
content_old: 18 What then? That in any way Whether in pretext､ or in truth Christ is declared And in this I rejoice—Yea､ and will rejoice!

content: 19 For I know that this shall turn unto me for salvation— Through your supplication､ and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,—
content_old: 19 For I know that this shall turn unto me for salvation— Through your supplication､ and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,—

content: 20 According to my eager outlook and hope, that in nothing shall I be put to shame. But with all freedom of speech as always､ now also shall Christ be magnified in my body, Whether through means of life､ or of death.
content_old: 20 According to my eager outlook and hope, that in nothing shall I be put to shame. But with all freedom of speech as always､ now also shall Christ be magnified in my body, Whether through means of life､ or of death.

content: 21 For unto me— Living is Christ, And dying gain.
content_old: 21 For unto me— Living is Christ, And dying gain.

content: 22 But if living in flesh is Christ This､ unto me is a fruit of work,— And what I shall choose I make not known:
content_old: 22 But if living in flesh is Christ This､ unto me is a fruit of work,— And what I shall choose I make not known:

content: 23 I am held in constraint､ howover､ by reason of the two,— Having the coveting to be released､ and to be with Christ. For it were far better!
content_old: 23 I am held in constraint､ howover､ by reason of the two,— Having the coveting to be released､ and to be with Christ. For it were far better!

content: 24 But to abide still in the flesh is more needful for your sake;
content_old: 24 But to abide still in the flesh is more needful for your sake;

content: 25 And of this being assured I know that I shall abide,—yea abide with you all､ for your advancement, and the joy of your faith;
content_old: 25 And of this being assured I know that I shall abide,—yea abide with you all､ for your advancement, and the joy of your faith;

content: 26 In order that your matter of boasting may be more abundant in Christ Jesus､ regarding me, through my own presence again with you.
content_old: 26 In order that your matter of boasting may be more abundant in Christ Jesus､ regarding me, through my own presence again with you.

content: 27 Only in a manner worthy of the glad-message of the Christ be using your citizenship; In order that— Whether coming and seeing you, or being absent I may hear of the things which concern you,— That ye are standing fast in one spirit, With one soul joining for the combat along with the faith of the glad-message;
content_old: 27 Only in a manner worthy of the glad-message of the Christ be using your citizenship; In order that— Whether coming and seeing you, or being absent I may hear of the things which concern you,— That ye are standing fast in one spirit, With one soul joining for the combat along with the faith of the glad-message;

content: 28 And not being affrighted in anything by the opposers,— The which is unto them a token of destruction, although of your salvation､ And this from God;
content_old: 28 And not being affrighted in anything by the opposers,— The which is unto them a token of destruction, although of your salvation､ And this from God;

content: 29 Because unto you hath it been given as a favour, in behalf of Christ Not only､ on him､ to believe, But also､ in his behalf､ to suffer:—
content_old: 29 Because unto you hath it been given as a favour, in behalf of Christ Not only､ on him､ to believe, But also､ in his behalf､ to suffer:—

content: 1 If there be､ therefore､ any encouragement in Christ, If any comfort of love, If any fellowship of spirit, If any tender affections and compassions
content_old: 1 If there be､ therefore､ any encouragement in Christ, If any comfort of love, If any fellowship of spirit, If any tender affections and compassions

content: 2 Fill ye up my joy— That the same thing ye esteem, The same love possessing, Joined in soul the one thing esteeming,—
content_old: 2 Fill ye up my joy— That the same thing ye esteem, The same love possessing, Joined in soul the one thing esteeming,—

content: 3 Nothing by way of faction､ Nothing by way of vain-glory,— But in lowliness of mind accounting one another superior to yourselves,—
content_old: 3 Nothing by way of faction､ Nothing by way of vain-glory,— But in lowliness of mind accounting one another superior to yourselves,—

content: 4 Not to your own things severally looking, But to the things of others severally:—
content_old: 4 Not to your own things severally looking, But to the things of others severally:—

content: 5 The same thing esteem in yourselves which also in Christ Jesus ye esteem,—
content_old: 5 The same thing esteem in yourselves which also in Christ Jesus ye esteem,—

content: 6 Who in form of God subsisting Not a thing to be seized accounted the being equal with God,
content_old: 6 Who in form of God subsisting Not a thing to be seized accounted the being equal with God,

content: 7 But himself emptied､ Taking a servant’s form､ Coming to be in men’s likeness;
content_old: 7 But himself emptied､ Taking a servant’s form､ Coming to be in men’s likeness;

content: 8 And in fashion being found as a man Humbled himself, Becoming obedient as far as death, Yea､ death upon a cross.
content_old: 8 And in fashion being found as a man Humbled himself, Becoming obedient as far as death, Yea､ death upon a cross.

content: 9 Wherefore also God uplifted him far on high, And favoured him with the name which is above every name,—
content_old: 9 Wherefore also God uplifted him far on high, And favoured him with the name which is above every name,—

content: 10 In order that in the name of Jesus every knee might bow— Of beings in heaven､ and on earth､ and underground,—
content_old: 10 In order that in the name of Jesus every knee might bow— Of beings in heaven､ and on earth､ and underground,—

content: 11 And every tongue might openly confess— That Jesus Christ is Lord､ Unto the glory of God the Father.
content_old: 11 And every tongue might openly confess— That Jesus Christ is Lord､ Unto the glory of God the Father.

content: 12 So､ then､ my beloved— Even as ye have always obeyed, Not as in my presence only､ But now much more in my absence With fear and trembling your own salvation be working out;
content_old: 12 So､ then､ my beloved— Even as ye have always obeyed, Not as in my presence only､ But now much more in my absence With fear and trembling your own salvation be working out;

content: 13 For it is God who energiseth within you､ both the desiring and the energising, in behalf of his good pleasure.
content_old: 13 For it is God who energiseth within you､ both the desiring and the energising, in behalf of his good pleasure.

content: 14 All things be doing､ apart from murmurings and disputings;
content_old: 14 All things be doing､ apart from murmurings and disputings;

content: 15 In order that ye may become faultless and inviolate, Children of God､ blameless amidst a crooked and perverted generation, Amongst whom ye appear as luminaries in the world､
content_old: 15 In order that ye may become faultless and inviolate, Children of God､ blameless amidst a crooked and perverted generation, Amongst whom ye appear as luminaries in the world､

content: 16 A word of light holding forth,— As a matter of boasting unto me､ for the day of Christ,— That not in vain I ran, Nor in vain I toiled:—
content_old: 16 A word of light holding forth,— As a matter of boasting unto me､ for the day of Christ,— That not in vain I ran, Nor in vain I toiled:—

content: 17 Nay! if I am even to be poured out as a drink-offering､ upon the sacrifice and public ministry of your faith I rejoice､ yea rejoice together with you all,—
content_old: 17 Nay! if I am even to be poured out as a drink-offering､ upon the sacrifice and public ministry of your faith I rejoice､ yea rejoice together with you all,—

content: 18 For the same cause moreover､ do ye also rejoice､ yea rejoice together with me.
content_old: 18 For the same cause moreover､ do ye also rejoice､ yea rejoice together with me.

content: 19 I am hoping､ however､ in the Lord Jesus— Timothy shortly to send unto you, In order that I also may be of cheerful soul､ when I have ascertained the things that concern you.
content_old: 19 I am hoping､ however､ in the Lord Jesus— Timothy shortly to send unto you, In order that I also may be of cheerful soul､ when I have ascertained the things that concern you.

content: 20 For no one have I､ of equal soul, Who genuinely as to the things that concern you will be anxious;
content_old: 20 For no one have I､ of equal soul, Who genuinely as to the things that concern you will be anxious;

content: 21 For they all their own things do seek, Not the things of Christ Jesus;
content_old: 21 For they all their own things do seek, Not the things of Christ Jesus;

content: 22 But of the proof of him be taking note,— That as child with father With me hath he done service for the glad-message;
content_old: 22 But of the proof of him be taking note,— That as child with father With me hath he done service for the glad-message;

content: 23 Him indeed､ therefore､ am I hoping to send— As soon as I can look off from the things that concern myself—forthwith.
content_old: 23 Him indeed､ therefore､ am I hoping to send— As soon as I can look off from the things that concern myself—forthwith.

content: 24 I am assured､ however､ in the Lord,—That I myself shall shortly come.
content_old: 24 I am assured､ however､ in the Lord,—That I myself shall shortly come.

content: 25 Needful nevertheless have I accounted it—Epaphroditus My brother and fellow worker and fellow soldier､ But your apostle and public minister to my need To send unto you;
content_old: 25 Needful nevertheless have I accounted it—Epaphroditus My brother and fellow worker and fellow soldier､ But your apostle and public minister to my need To send unto you;

content: 26 Since he hath been longing to see you all, And hath been in great distress､ because ye had heard he was sick;—
content_old: 26 Since he hath been longing to see you all, And hath been in great distress､ because ye had heard he was sick;—

content: 27 And､ in fact､ he was sick, nigh unto death; But God had mercy on him,— And not on him only､ But on me also, Lest sorrow upon sorrow I should have.
content_old: 27 And､ in fact､ he was sick, nigh unto death; But God had mercy on him,— And not on him only､ But on me also, Lest sorrow upon sorrow I should have.

content: 28 The more promptly therefore､ have I sent him, That seeing him again ye may rejoice､ And I the less sorrowful may be.
content_old: 28 The more promptly therefore､ have I sent him, That seeing him again ye may rejoice､ And I the less sorrowful may be.

content: 29 Be giving him welcome､ therefore､ in the Lord, with all joy; And such as he in honour be holding,—
content_old: 29 Be giving him welcome､ therefore､ in the Lord, with all joy; And such as he in honour be holding,—

content: 1 For the rest､ my brethren—Rejoice in the Lord. To be writing the same things unto you To me is not irksome, while for you it is safe:—
content_old: 1 For the rest､ my brethren—Rejoice in the Lord. To be writing the same things unto you To me is not irksome, while for you it is safe:—

content: 2 Beware of the dogs, Beware of mischievous workers, Beware of the mutilation;
content_old: 2 Beware of the dogs, Beware of mischievous workers, Beware of the mutilation;

content: 3 For we are the circumcision､ Who In the Spirit of God are doing divine service, And are boasting in Christ Jesus, And not in flesh having confidence,—
content_old: 3 For we are the circumcision､ Who In the Spirit of God are doing divine service, And are boasting in Christ Jesus, And not in flesh having confidence,—

content: 4 Although､ indeed､ I might have confidence even in flesh. If any other thinketh to have confidence in flesh I more:—
content_old: 4 Although､ indeed､ I might have confidence even in flesh. If any other thinketh to have confidence in flesh I more:—

content: 5 Circumcised the eighth day, Of the race of Israel, Of the tribe of Benjamin, A Hebrew of Hebrews,— Regarding law a Pharisee,
content_old: 5 Circumcised the eighth day, Of the race of Israel, Of the tribe of Benjamin, A Hebrew of Hebrews,— Regarding law a Pharisee,

content: 6 Regarding zeal persecuting the assembly, Regarding the righteousness that is in law having become blameless.
content_old: 6 Regarding zeal persecuting the assembly, Regarding the righteousness that is in law having become blameless.

content: 7 But whatever things unto me were gain The same have I accounted for the Christ’s sake loss;
content_old: 7 But whatever things unto me were gain The same have I accounted for the Christ’s sake loss;

content: 8 Yea､ doubtless! and I account all things to be loss､ Because of the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord, For the sake of whom the loss of all things have I suffered, And do account them refuse In order that Christ I may win､
content_old: 8 Yea､ doubtless! and I account all things to be loss､ Because of the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord, For the sake of whom the loss of all things have I suffered, And do account them refuse In order that Christ I may win､

content: 9 And be found in him— Not having a righteousness of my own､ That which is by law, But that which is through faith in Christ, The righteousness which is of God upon my faith,—
content_old: 9 And be found in him— Not having a righteousness of my own､ That which is by law, But that which is through faith in Christ, The righteousness which is of God upon my faith,—

content: 10 To get to know him､ And the power of his resurrection and fellowship of his sufferings, Becoming conformed unto his death,—
content_old: 10 To get to know him､ And the power of his resurrection and fellowship of his sufferings, Becoming conformed unto his death,—

content: 11 If by any means I may advance to the earlier resurrection､ which is from among the dead:
content_old: 11 If by any means I may advance to the earlier resurrection､ which is from among the dead:

content: 12 Not that I have already received､ Or have already reached perfection, But I am pressing on— If I may even lay hold of that for which I have also been laid hold of by Christ Jesus:—
content_old: 12 Not that I have already received､ Or have already reached perfection, But I am pressing on— If I may even lay hold of that for which I have also been laid hold of by Christ Jesus:—

content: 13 Brethren! I as to myself reckon that I have not yet laid hold; One thing､ however､— The things behind forgetting､ And unto the things before eagerly reaching out
content_old: 13 Brethren! I as to myself reckon that I have not yet laid hold; One thing､ however､— The things behind forgetting､ And unto the things before eagerly reaching out

content: 14 With the goal in view I press on For the prize of the upward calling of God in Christ Jesus.
content_old: 14 With the goal in view I press on For the prize of the upward calling of God in Christ Jesus.

content: 15 As many､ therefore､ as are full-grown Let this be our resolve; And if somewhat differently ye are resoIved This､ also shall God unto you reveal.
content_old: 15 As many､ therefore､ as are full-grown Let this be our resolve; And if somewhat differently ye are resoIved This､ also shall God unto you reveal.

content: 16 Nevertheless whereunto we have advanced In the same rank stepping along.
content_old: 16 Nevertheless whereunto we have advanced In the same rank stepping along.

content: 17 Imitators together of me become ye, brethren, And keep an eye on them who thus are walking,— Even as ye have us for an ensample.
content_old: 17 Imitators together of me become ye, brethren, And keep an eye on them who thus are walking,— Even as ye have us for an ensample.

content: 18 For many are walking— Of whom I have often been telling you, And now､ even weeping am telling,— The enemies of the cross of the Christ;
content_old: 18 For many are walking— Of whom I have often been telling you, And now､ even weeping am telling,— The enemies of the cross of the Christ;

content: 19 Whose end is destruction､ Whose God is the belly､ And whose glory is in their shame, Who upon the earthly things are resolved.
content_old: 19 Whose end is destruction､ Whose God is the belly､ And whose glory is in their shame, Who upon the earthly things are resolved.

content: 20 For our citizenship in the heavens hath its rise; Wherefore a Saviour also do we ardently await,— The Lord Jesus Christ,—
content_old: 20 For our citizenship in the heavens hath its rise; Wherefore a Saviour also do we ardently await,— The Lord Jesus Christ,—

content: 1 So then､ my brethren､ beloved and longed for､ my joy and crown,— Thus stand fast in the Lord､ beloved.
content_old: 1 So then､ my brethren､ beloved and longed for､ my joy and crown,— Thus stand fast in the Lord､ beloved.

content: 2 Euodia I exhort､ and Syntche I exhort,— On the same thing to be resolved in the Lord:—
content_old: 2 Euodia I exhort､ and Syntche I exhort,— On the same thing to be resolved in the Lord:—

content: 3 Yea! I request thee also､ true yokefellow, Be thou helping together with these women,— Who indeed､ in the joyful message have maintained the combat with me, Along with Clement also､ and the rest of my fellow-workers, Whose names are in the book of life.
content_old: 3 Yea! I request thee also､ true yokefellow, Be thou helping together with these women,— Who indeed､ in the joyful message have maintained the combat with me, Along with Clement also､ and the rest of my fellow-workers, Whose names are in the book of life.

content: 4 Rejoice in the Lord always: Again I will say—Rejoice!
content_old: 4 Rejoice in the Lord always: Again I will say—Rejoice!

content: 5 Let your considerateness be known unto all men. The Lord is near:—
content_old: 5 Let your considerateness be known unto all men. The Lord is near:—

content: 6 For nothing be anxious, But in everything by your prayer and supplication with thanksgiving Let your petitions be made known unto God;
content_old: 6 For nothing be anxious, But in everything by your prayer and supplication with thanksgiving Let your petitions be made known unto God;

content: 7 And the peace of God､ which riseth above every mind shall guard your hearts and your thoughts､ in Christ Jesus.
content_old: 7 And the peace of God､ which riseth above every mind shall guard your hearts and your thoughts､ in Christ Jesus.

content: 8 For the rest､ brethren Whatsoever things are true��� Whatsoever things are dignified､ Whatsoever things are righteous､ Whatsoever things are chaste､ Whatsoever things are lovely､ Whatsoever things are of good report,— If there be any virtue､ and if any praise The same be taking into account;
content_old: 8 For the rest､ brethren Whatsoever things are true��� Whatsoever things are dignified､ Whatsoever things are righteous､ Whatsoever things are chaste､ Whatsoever things are lovely､ Whatsoever things are of good report,— If there be any virtue､ and if any praise The same be taking into account;

content: 9 The things which ye have both learned､ and accepted､ and heard､ and seen in me The same practise;— And the God of peace shall be with you.
content_old: 9 The things which ye have both learned､ and accepted､ and heard､ and seen in me The same practise;— And the God of peace shall be with you.

content: 10 Howbeit I have been made to rejoice in the Lord greatly— That now､ at length ye have flourished in your care for me,— Although､ indeed､ ye were caring､ but lacked opportunity.
content_old: 10 Howbeit I have been made to rejoice in the Lord greatly— That now､ at length ye have flourished in your care for me,— Although､ indeed､ ye were caring､ but lacked opportunity.

content: 11 Not that as to coming short I am speaking, For I have learned In whatsoever circumstances I am to be independent:
content_old: 11 Not that as to coming short I am speaking, For I have learned In whatsoever circumstances I am to be independent:

content: 12 I know what it is even to be kept low, And I know what it is to have more than enough,— In every way､ and in all things have I been let into the secret— Both to be well fed､ And to be hungering, Both to have more than enough､ And to be coming short:
content_old: 12 I know what it is even to be kept low, And I know what it is to have more than enough,— In every way､ and in all things have I been let into the secret— Both to be well fed､ And to be hungering, Both to have more than enough､ And to be coming short:

content: 13 I have might for all things in him that empowereth me.
content_old: 13 I have might for all things in him that empowereth me.

content: 14 Nevertheless nobly have ye done､ in taking fellowship with me in my tribulation.
content_old: 14 Nevertheless nobly have ye done､ in taking fellowship with me in my tribulation.

content: 15 Ye know､ moreover, even ye､ Philippians,— That in the beginning of the glad-message､ When I went forth from Macedonia Not so much as one assembly with me had fellowship—in the matter of giving and receiving—save ye alone,—
content_old: 15 Ye know､ moreover, even ye､ Philippians,— That in the beginning of the glad-message､ When I went forth from Macedonia Not so much as one assembly with me had fellowship—in the matter of giving and receiving—save ye alone,—

content: 16 That even in Thessalonica, both once and again unto my need ye sent:—
content_old: 16 That even in Thessalonica, both once and again unto my need ye sent:—

content: 17 Not that I seek after the gift, But I seek after the fruit that is to abound unto your account.
content_old: 17 Not that I seek after the gift, But I seek after the fruit that is to abound unto your account.

content: 18 But I have all things in full､ and have more than enough, I am filled､ having welcomed from Epaphroditus the things that came from you,— A fragrance of sweet smell, An acceptable sacrifice, Well pleasing unto God.
content_old: 18 But I have all things in full､ and have more than enough, I am filled､ having welcomed from Epaphroditus the things that came from you,— A fragrance of sweet smell, An acceptable sacrifice, Well pleasing unto God.

content: 19 And my God will fill up your every need, According to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
content_old: 19 And my God will fill up your every need, According to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.

content: 20 Now unto our God and Father be the glory— Unto the ages of ages. Amen!
content_old: 20 Now unto our God and Father be the glory— Unto the ages of ages. Amen!

content: 21 Salute ye every saint in Christ Jesus. The brethren who are with me salute you.
content_old: 21 Salute ye every saint in Christ Jesus. The brethren who are with me salute you.

content: 22 All the saints salute you, but especially they who are of Cæsar’s household.
content_old: 22 All the saints salute you, but especially they who are of Cæsar’s household.
